mapper.sql: LOG_JOB_STEP_ID AS logJobStepId , LOG_JOB_ID AS logJobId , CHANNEL_ID AS channelId , LOG_DATE AS logDate , JOBNAME AS jobname , STEPNAME AS stepname , LINES_READ AS linesRead , LINES_WRITTEN AS linesWritten , LINES_UPDATED AS linesUpdated , LINES_INPUT AS linesInput , LINES_OUTPUT AS linesOutput , LINES_REJECTED AS linesRejected , ERRORS AS errors , RESULT AS result , NR_RESULT_ROWS AS nrResultRows , NR_RESULT_FILES AS nrResultFiles , LOG_FIELD AS logField , COPY_NR AS copyNr , SETP_LOG AS setpLog
